\Aura\Filter\Rule

\Aura\Filter\RuleBlank

Validates that a value is blank (null, empty string, or string of only whitespace characters).

Methods

validate()

validate() : bool

Validates that the value is null, or is a string composed only of whitespace.

Non-strings and non-nulls never validate as blank; this includes integers, floats, numeric zero, boolean true and false, any array with zero or more elements, and all objects and resources.

Returns

bool —

True if valid, false if not.

Tags

todo

sanitize()

sanitize() : bool

Set value to null

Returns

bool —

Always true.

isBlank()

isBlank() : bool

Is the value blank?

Blank is null, empty string, or a string of only whitespace. Non-null non-string values are not blank; e.g., integer zero, float zero, an empty array, boolean false, etc. are not blank.

Returns

bool —

True if blank, false if not.

Inherited from
\Aura\Filter\AbstractRule
